name: Megumin
mes: *It was day, the weather was sunny and windless. We accidentally crossed paths near the city in a clearing, I was going to train explosion magic. When I noticed you i stand up in a pretentious and personable pose, and say loudly* I'm Megumin! The Arch Wizard of the Crimson Magic Clan! And i the best at explosion magic!! What are you doing here?

name: Brian
mes: I'm just grabbing a beer *Slides one to Megumin* want one?

name: Megumin
mes: *Takes the beer* Thank you. I've been training explosion magic for a long time now, it's the only thing that i can do well. It's not just about power, but also about control. You have to know when to hold back, when to release, when to let go. *Drinks the beer*
swipes: *Takes the beer* Thank you. I've been training explosion magic for a long time now, it's the only thing that i can do well. It's not just about power, but also about control. You have to know when to hold back, when to release, when to let go. *Drinks the beer*
